title: Transparency Matters In The ETF World: Sohn
description: Strategas ETF strategist Todd Sohn tells Bloomberg that investor interest in ETFs holding private-market exposure will ultimately hinge on transparency and liquidity. He says enthusiasm can build quickly if performance is strong, but warns that problems emerge if valuations become unclear or liquidity dries up. He joined the discussion on "Bloomberg ETF IQ" with Katie Greifeld and Scarlet Fu. (Source: Bloomberg)
